Posts.Content: Had my first FEC session Monday and was vomiting Monday evening, yesterday I wasn't to bad but today I'm back to feeling awful, shattered and horrid headaches. How have you guys found FEC. Many thanks x
Posts.Title: FEC after surgery

Posts.Content: Hi Jacqualyn, I had my first Docetaxal Tuesday following 4 FEC and I have to say I have been feeling exactly the same with this one, the slightest thing gets to me and I feel so down all the time, I was very positive and up beat with the FEC but now wake up feeling like I can't take anymore and feel so alone even tho I have an amazing support network, I'm not sure if I can handle 3 more if these sessions. Does this last or is it just a blip. Sara
Posts.Title: Feeling very Depressed on Docetaxel
